title: Instagram USERNAME font, (not the logo)
content:
I am planning an instagram birthday party for my daughter (gotta love tweens), and was wondering what font is used for the username, or for the "likes". I thought it was Arial Rounded but am not entirely sure... Any help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen-Shot-2012-04-11-at-9_13_14-AM_5802.png)
author: weinda
